content.text:
HON. JAMES R. LANGEVIN

                            of rhode island

                    in the house of representatives

                       Tuesday, November 7, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. LANGEVIN. Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably detained. Had I been 
present, I would have voted YEA on Roll Call No. 607; YEA on Roll Call 
No. 608; and NAY on Roll Call No. 609.
content.speaker: Mr. LANGEVIN
